title: How to Evolve to Race V2 in Blox Fruits: Full Gameplay Guide

steps.title: Meet the prerequisites.
steps.content: Meet the prerequisites. Before you can get Race V2, you must complete the Colosseum Quest. To have access to the Colosseum Quest, you must be at least level 850 and have access to the Second Sea. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Find and speak to Bartilo in the Cafe.
steps.content: Find and speak to Bartilo in the Cafe. The Cafe is in the Kingdom of Rose. When you speak to Bartilo, the first task he will give you is to kill 50 Swan Pirates.

steps.title: Kill 50 Swan Pirates.
steps.content: Kill 50 Swan Pirates. Swan Pirates are a level 775 enemy found in the Kingdom of Rose, near the Area 2 Quest Giver. [2] X Research source Once you've completed this part of the quest, return to Bartilo in the Cafe.

steps.title: Kill Jeremy.
steps.content: Kill Jeremy. Bartilo will ask you to kill Jeremy, a level 850 boss. Jeremy can be found on a plateau on top of the mountain near the Swan Pirates (in the Kingdom of Rose Area 2). Jeremy spawns every 20 minutes. [3] X Research source Once you've completed this part of the quest, return to Bartilo in the Cafe.

steps.title: Go to the Colosseum.
steps.content: Go to the Colosseum. Bartilo will next ask you to save the Gladiators in the Colosseum. The Colosseum is near Don Swan's Mansion.

steps.title: Enter the secret code to complete the quest.
steps.content: Enter the secret code to complete the quest. The secret code is Y, ∞, C, S, M, F, N, B . This code is found inside Don Swan's Mansion, but you don't need to find the code in game to enter it and complete the quest. Completing this quest gets you the Warrior Helmet and access to King Red Head and the Alchemist NPC—which is the character you need to talk to to get Race V2.

steps.title: Go to the Green Zone.
steps.content: Go to the Green Zone. The Alchemist is in the Green Zone, which is connected to the Kingdom of Rose by a bridge.

steps.title: Locate the Alchemist.
steps.content: Locate the Alchemist. The Alchemist is slightly hidden, but he's not difficult to find. Follow these steps to get to the Alchemist: Once you get off the bridge, go straight past the brown rock with a treasure chest next to it. Keep moving forward and go around the large stalk next to the rock. You should see the Marine Quest Giver standing next to the base of a different stalk. Go between the stalk to the right of the Marine Quest Giver and a brown rock. Turn around. You should see a brown path that goes towards the stalk, and the trunk of a mushroom. Move towards the path and follow it to the backside of the stalk. The Alchemist is here, tucked away behind the stalk and the mushroom.

steps.title: Talk to the Alchemist.
steps.content: Talk to the Alchemist. The Alchemist will ask you to complete the Flower Quest before he can upgrade you to Race V2. Note that if you leave the server or die while doing this quest, any flowers you collect will be lost and you'll have to get them again.

steps.title: Collect the Blue, Red, and Yellow Flowers.
steps.content: Collect the Blue, Red, and Yellow Flowers. These flowers are in various locations around the Blox Fruits world: [4] X Research source Blue Flower: Cave Island (in a secret room accessed via a hole in the ceiling), Graveyard (beneath a tree facing the cave, or on a grave), Usoapp Island (behind the left house, or just on the ground) Note that the Blue Flower can only be found at night and will despawn during the day. They will also not spawn when Darkbeard is summoned. Red Flower: Kingdom of Rose (next to the red building in the first area), Don Swan's Mansion (in a bush on the left), Green Zone (behind the Marine Lieutenant, behind a rock near Fajita), Factory (on the plateau nearest the bridge) The Red Flower spawns both day and night. If you are on a new or private server, however, the Red Flower won't spawn until the morning of the second day. Yellow Flower: Unlike the other flowers, the Yellow Flower is a potential drop when killing any enemy in the Second Sea. Swan Pirates are recommended because they group close together (which works great if you have the Buddha Fruit ) and are easy to defeat.

steps.title: Return to the Alchemist.
steps.content: Return to the Alchemist. Having completed the Flower Quest, the Alchemist will let you purchase Race V2 for $500,000. [5] X Research source Note that if you want to evolve all races to V2, it will cost $3,000,000. You'll also have to complete the Flower Quest each time you want to upgrade a race.
